subject: Wimbledon Tennis Tournament
Tennis
lead_paragraph: The top-ranked men’s player, Roger Federer, has won Wimbledon four years in a row. If he wins again, he will be the fourth men’s player to win five consecutive titles.
snippet: The top-ranked men’s player, Roger Federer, has won Wimbledon four years in a row. If he wins again, he will be the fourth men’s player to win five consecutive titles.
